H0.text: The Sandals corporation headquartered in Montego Bay is famous in the industry of. Luxury Hotels

H1.text: The Sandals corporation headquartered in Montego Bay is famous in the industry of. Water Sports Equipment

H2.text: The Sandals corporation headquartered in Montego Bay is famous in the industry of. Caribbean Cuisine

H3.text: The Sandals corporation headquartered in Montego Bay is famous in the industry of. Holiday resorts

A4.text: Sandals Resorts is a Jamaican operator of all-inclusive couples resorts in the Caribbean.

A5.text: Sandals Resorts International (SRI) is based in Montego Bay, Jamaica and is responsible for development, service standards, training, and day-to-day operations of the resorts.
